name: Sweet Potato™ Sockett® Couture Giraffe Sock Puppet
description: Sweet Potato™ is our soulful Giraffe Sockett®. Sewn on a genuine, American cotton sock (knit in Alabama exclusively for Socketts®), and detailed with USA made ecospun felt, this is the BEST Giraffe sock puppet available. With the help of hand tie-dye she has a one-of-a-kind pattern just like giraffes in the wild and a colorful, plush mane and dreamy eyes. A soft felt mouth gives her a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Parts are machine sewn for safety, strength, & long lasting durability. Sweet Potato™ is the perfect addition to any animal or puppet lover's collection. For an explanation of Sockett® sizes. Click Here Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary from models shown. Giraffe Sock Puppet. Copyright 2006

name: Elijah™ Sockett® Designer Lion Sock Puppet in Yellow or Tan
description:
Elijah™ is everything a lion sock puppet should be. Loaded with a regal and charming personality this gorgeous puppet is sewn on our traditional, soft, American cotton, real sock base and is rich in fun detail including a lush faux fur mane and braided yarn tail. Complete with quilted tongue, his working felt mouth gives this lion puppet a range of facial expressions and lets him speak or roar to his heart's content! Available in two sizes and in Yellow or Tan. See options below.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade and one-of-a-kind so color & detail may vary from models shown.

Lion Sock Puppet

name: The Sockett Kit. World's BEST Sock Puppet Kit
description:
The Sockett Kit is a fun, versatile and sophisticated puppet making project for school age children. It contains everything needed to create 3, one-of-a-kind puppets of their own design!

Vastly superior to its many imitators, The Sockett kit comes with genuine, high quality, American cotton sock bases and is LOADED with an abundance of colorful, soft materials that inspire imagination and provide hours of art making fun and creative play. Recommended for ages 7-adult.

KIT CONTAINS: 3 Sockett bases with working felt mouths, Soft felt, Stiff felt, Yarn, Faux fur, Feathers, Pom-poms, Craft foam, Foam shapes, Craft glue, Creating suggestions & photos. Packaged in a cool, reusable, corrugated Sockett house that you can decorate. Choose from 3 color combinations. Bases available in either "small" or "regular". All materials certified non-toxic. Ages 7-adult.

Made in the USA !

For a description of Sockett® sizes. Click Here Sock Puppet Kit

name: Stormy™ Sockett® Designer Elephant Sock Puppet
description:
Stormy™ our beautiful elephant Sockett® is made in soft gray tones on our classic American cotton sock base. The soft felt mouth, jointed trunk, stuffed tusks and large felt ears and eyes are made form 100% USA-made, ecopsun felt. This elephant sock puppet is the perfect edition to any animal or puppet lover's collection. Pair Stormy™ with Elijah™ the lion or Pyziel™ our zebra sock puppet for a fun and fabulous sock puppet safari! All parts are machine sewn for safety and lasting durability. Machine washable.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes. Click Here Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown. Elephant Sock Puppet

name: Ike™ Couture Dinosaur Sock Puppet
description:
Ike the Triceratops Sockett® is the perfect gift for your active little dinosaur lover! This Triceratops sock puppet is made on our colorful, classic, American cotton Sockett® base and detailed with ecospun felt made from post-consumer, recycled bottles. Triceratops horns are stuffed with polyfill. As with all of our sock puppets, each and every dinosaur puppet we sew is a handmade, one-of-a-kind, heirloom quality toy. We honor custom color requests, contact us with yours!

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here.

*If you select "Custom" be sure to notify us of your custom color choice. Dinosaur Sock Puppet Triceratops sock puppet

name: Thistle™ Sockett® Designer Red Fox Sock Puppet
description:
Thistle™ the gorgeous Red Fox Sockett® feels equally at home in the deep woods or on the outskirts of your town. This foxy sock puppet sports a lush red tail & smart nylon whiskers. The soft felt mouth is lined with pointy but soft felt teeth and allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Combine Thistle™ with Jack or Sidney for your next puppet production of The Fox & The Hound.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary from models shown.

Red Fox Sock Puppet

name: Barley™  Couture Bunny Rabbit Sock Puppet
description:
Our Beautiful bouncing Bunny Socketts® will hop into your heart with her puffy tail and tall, lively ears (made from 100% ecospun felt!). Expertly stitched on colorful, super soft, American cotton socks, these funny bunny sock puppets have a soft felt mouths that allow for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Big felt teeth are fun for chomping on imaginary carrots & friends' fingers alike. Available in two sizes and a variety of colors.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary from models shown.

Bunny Rabbit Sock Puppets

name: Finn™ Couture Fish Sock Puppet
description: Finn™ is a swimmingly good Tropical Fish puppet and a popular member of the Sockett® aquatic line. This adorable fish is handmade on our classic, American cotton sock and has colorful fins made from gloriously "green" ecospun felt. The beautiful colors and charming pop-up eyes make Finn™ a fabulous story telling buddy and super cool puppet show star. Since every Sockett® is handmade to order, detail colors and patterns may vary from the model shown. This guarantees you will receive a truly unique piece of art and a one-of-a-kind, collectable, heirloom quality toy. All parts are machine sewn for strength and safety. Machine wash instructions are sewn into the label. Finn™ can be made in most colors. Contact us if you have a Custom Color request. For an explanation of Sockett® sizes. Click Here Goldfish sock puppet. Copyright 2006

name: Portia™  Sockett® Pig Sock Puppet
description:
Pretty Portia™ pig is the perfectly pleasing in pink or purple and now in blue too!. She is constructed on our classic American cotton sock base (knit exclusively for Socketts® ) and detailed with ecospun felt. Portia™ pig has a curly tail, bright eyes and a round snout. Some pig puppets are made with a flower and others with a tuft of fur. All have the classic, Sockett®, soft felt mouth making them perfect for story telling and performing in puppet shows. All parts are machine sewn for safety, strength & lasting durability. Machine wash instructions are sewn into every puppet. To request Portia™ in a custom color-choose the "Custom" option in the drop down menu and email us your color choice.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary some from models shown.

Pig Sock Puppet

name: Lilly™ Sockett® Couture Cow Sock Puppet
description:
Lilly™ is our captivating Cow Sockett®. She is constructed on our traditional, super soft, American cotton sock base and detailed with gloriously "green" ecospun felt. Lilly™ has a soft felt mouth that allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak" (moo!) This utterly delightful, bovine beauty is by far the best cow sock puppet around. She is available in black and white & brown and white and is practically perfect in purple too! Partner Lilly™ with Lucky Duckling, Thunder the Horse or Portia Pig for a complete farm Sockett® set.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown.

Cow sock puppet

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Superhero edition
description: Invent your own Superhero character with Stick Puppet Party!® Superhero edition™. This fabulous project lets you create 5, LARGE, one-of-a-kind, Superhero stick puppets of your own design. Stick Puppet Party!® Superhero edition™ is a fun, fast-drying & easy-to-use puppet making kit. You assemble the puppets, make the costumes, color and cut out the included faces and create a story line starring your unique Superhero. Makes a wonderful gift, theme party activity or creative rainy day, family night, school or after school project. Just add scissors and markers, everything else is included. Finished puppets stand over 14" tall and have movable arms & legs. Kit Contains: 5 corrugated cardboard bodies, 5 pairs of arms and legs, 5 blank heads, 5 superhero faces for you to customize, 5 sticks, 20 clips, 8 sheets of decorative paper for easy to make costumes, glue & ez to follow directions. No two Superhero puppets will ever be the same! Age 6-adult. Copyright 2011 Tigercandy Arts, Inc. Package design concept by Rebecca A. Kandel. Superhero puppet kit

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Princess edition
description: Design your own stick puppets and perform original, fairytale puppet show with Stick Puppet Party!® Princess edition. Our most intricate SPP! to date, Princess ed. is PERFECT for the imaginative child who enjoys Fantasy, Art, Craft and Clothing Design! (See below for age recommendations). LOADED with hours of creative fun this fabulous, puppet making craft activity lets girls make 6 LARGE, one-of-a-kind, international Princess puppets and design their glamorous gowns! Finished puppets stand over 14" tall & have movable arms & legs. Made in USA Kit Includes: 5 international Princess faces + 1 bonus self portrait Princess 6 corrugated bodies, 6 pairs of arms and legs, 24 brass fasteners, 6 sticks, 10 colorful, designer papers for creating dresses and ball gowns 3 dress stencils for creating dozens of fashions 1 clear glue 1 idea card 1 packet of flesh tone papers Directions. Safe for Ages 6+ recommended for 7+ *Makes a great "mommy & me" project for 6 year olds. For simpler Stick Puppet projects see: Stick Puppet Party! Classic edition. & Stick Puppet Party! Superhero edition. Copyright 2012 Tigercandy Arts, Inc. Package design by Rebecca A. Kandel. Princess Stick Puppet Kit

name: FizzY™ Sockett® Couture Monster Sock Puppet
description:
Seasonal Design. Available September 1-November 1 FizzY™ is a ferociously fun, furry and fabulous monster Sockett®! The perfect gift for kids and adults alike, FizzY™ is constructed on a soft turquoise, cotton sock (knit exclusively for Socketts® ) and covered in super cuddly, lush turquoise, faux fur. FizzY's™ felt parts are made from 100% USA-made ecospun felt. All parts are machine sewn for lasting strength and durability. Fizzy's™ soft mouth (lined with large felt teeth) allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to speak (and growl!) Machine wash instructions are sewn into every label. Available in 7 colors combinations or contact us for a custom color.

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary from models shown. Click Here for an EXPLANATION of SOCKETT® SIZES.

Monster Sock Puppet

name: Lucky™ Sockett® Couture Duck Sock Puppet
description:
Lucky™, our quirky, duckling Sockett® is sewn on a super soft, genuine, American cotton sock base (knit in Alabama exclusively for Socketts®!) His wing and tail feathers are made from lush, faux fur and his cute webbed feet and stiff, quackable beak are made of USA-made, ecospun felt. All parts are machine sewn for safety, strength, and durability. See color options below. *Also available in "Chick" design. Similar design with chicken feet and a slightly shorter beak. (pic coming soon)

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Duck Sock Puppet

name: Sidney™ Sockett® Couture Cocker Spaniel Sock Puppet
description:
Sidney™ our golden Cocker Spaniel Sockett® is loaded with sock puppet charm. Constructed on our classic, American cotton sock base and detailed with ecospun felt and luxurious faux fur, this dog is super cuddly and a lot of fun to play with! Sidney™ has long silky ears and a cropped tail just like real Cocker Spaniels. A soft felt mouth (complete with quilted tongue) allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak" making this pup the perfect story time companion or puppet show star! All parts are machine sewn for safety, strength and lasting durability.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown.

Dog Sock Puppet. Cocker Spaniel puppet

name: Fenton™ Couture Frog Sock Puppet
description:
Fun loving, fabulous Fenton™ the frog will have you flipping with joy. This fantastic frog sock puppet is a Tigercandy Arts classic and one of our most popular designs. Constructed on a genuine, super soft, American cotton sock and detailed with ecospun felt he has adorable pop eyes, gangly jointed limbs and a real working felt mouth that complete with long, fly-catching tongue allows for a range of facial expressions and gives Fenton™ the ability to "speak" (and croak!).

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Frog Sock Puppet

name: Thunder™ Sockett® Couture Horse Sock Puppet
description:
Thunder™ our Horse Sockett® captures the most earnest and endearing qualities of America's favorite animal. Constructed with delicate stitching on our signature American cotton sock base, this beautiful horse sock puppet has a soft, elegant, faux fur mane; large round eyes with bristle lashes; big teeth (perfect for crunching apples!) and an old-fashioned yarn tail tied with a silky ribbon. Thunder is sure to inspire hours of imaginative play for your favorite little cowboy (or girl). Choose from seven colors and two sizes!

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown.

Horse Sock Puppet

name: Fedor™ Couture Siberian Tiger Sock Puppet
description:
Meet Fedor™, the newest member of the Sockett® collection. This beautiful Siberian Tiger sock puppet is made from our classic, American cotton sock (knit exclusively for Socketts®) and ecospun felt. This designer Tiger puppet is artfully constructed down to the finest detail. He has lush faux fur trim, nylon whiskers and hand dyed stripes to give him a a one of a kind pattern just like tigers in the wild. This Siberian Tiger Sock Puppet is the perfect gift for that special someone and is sure to be the crowning glory in your Sockett® wildlife collection! Also available in golden, Bengal Tiger version .

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown.

Siberian Tiger Sock Puppet

name: Dizzy™ Sockett® Couture Monster Sock Puppet
description:
Seasonal Design. Available September 1-November 1. Dizzy™ is a fun and fabulous monster Sockett®. This adorable monster sock puppet is constructed on a genuine American cotton sock base (knit exclusively for Socketts® ) and covered in soft and kinky red faux fur. All felt parts are made from 100% USA made ecospun felt and machine sewn for lasting strength and durability. Dizzy's™ soft felt mouth is lined with large felt teeth perfect for giving playful bites and big wide grins grrr!!! 8 fantastic and fury colors combos to choose from!

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown. Click Here for an EXPLANATION of SOCKETT® SIZES.

Monster Sock Puppet

name: Tandoori™ Sockett® Bengal Tiger Sock Puppet
description:
Tandoori™ our beautiful golden tiger sock puppet is full of personality and charming details. Sewn on our classic, American cotton sock base (knit in North Carolina exclusively for Socketts®) this gorgeous tiger sock puppet has quilted ears, unique felt stripes and a colorful, braided yarn tail. A soft felt mouth allows for a range of facial expressions and gives Tandoori™ the ability to "speak" (and roar!). This terrific treasure is sure to bring pleasure to your little tiger for many years to come. Pair Tandoori™ with Sweet Potato™ the Giraffe or Elijah™ the Lion for an exciting wild animal sock puppet adventure. Also available in Siberian Tiger version .

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade so color & detail may vary slightly from models shown.

Tiger Sock Puppet

name: Parsley™ Sockett® Couture Turtle Sock Puppet
description:
At Tigercandy Arts we are dedicated to elaborate detail and unparalleled quality. Constructed from over 40 separate, hand-cut pieces, Parsley™ the charming turtle sock puppet is the shining embodiment of the art that is Sockett®! Every turtle sock puppet we make is one-of-a-kind and dons a unique, brightly patterned, felt dome shell that he can pull his head into when he is feeling shy or wants a little 'alone time'. Children and adults alike will respond to the gentle spirit of this slow moving friend. Pair Parsley™ with one of our spry Bunny Socketts® for your next production of The Tortoise & The Hare or simply sit him on your desk for a little "as needed" cheer.

For an explanation of Sockett® sizes Click Here .

Socketts® are handmade and one-of-a-kind so color & detail may vary from models shown.

Turtle Sock Puppet. Copyright 2006.

name: Bento™ Couture Bat Sock Puppet
description:
Bento™ Bat is one charming little (blood) sucker. This gorgeous, one-of-a-kind, designer Bat sock puppet is constructed on our American cotton sock base and detailed with ecospun felt. He has quilted wings and a soft felt mouth (complete with vampire teeth) that gives him a range of expressions and the ability to "speak". All parts are machine sewn for safety, strength and lasting durability. Bento™ the bat sock puppet is available in two sizes and a number of awesome detail colors. Pick the one that suits you best because chances are he'll be "hangin' around" for a while! Contact us for a custom color request.

name: Rosie™  Sockett® Couture Poodle Sock
description:
This perky poodle sock puppet is a popular pick as nine out of ten little girls say Rosie™ is tops! This adorable poodle Sockett® is constructed on our classic American cotton sock base and detailed with soft, faux, poodle fur, ecospun felt and satin ribbons. Her felt mouth, complete with quilted tongue, allows for a range of facial expressions the ability to "speak". Splendidly show stopping, this little dog puppet is sure to be a favorite of your favorite little one. Now available in purple too!

name: Pyziel™  Sockett® Couture Zebra Sock Puppet
description:
Pyziel™ means "spirit" in Zebra and this spunky little guy has earned his name! Intricately designed, our gorgeous black & white zebra sock puppet is constructed on a classic, American cotton Sockett® base and detailed with a super soft, faux fur mane, ecospun felt ears, and a braided yarn tail. Hand tie-dye gives this zebra puppet a unique camouflage pattern just like zebras in the wild. The real, working, soft felt mouth allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Combine Pyziel™ with Elijah™ the lion, Sweet Potato™ Giraffe or Tandoori™ Tiger for an exotic Sockett® puppet production!

name: Peanut™ Sockett®  Squirrel Sock Puppet
description:
Peanut™ is a member of the Urban Wildlife Sockett® collection. This adorable squirrel sock puppet is professionally sewn on our super soft, thick, American cotton sock and expertly detailed (down to the whiskers and quilted, buck teeth) with ecospun felt and lush, faux fur. A soft, felt mouth gives Peanut™ a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Peanut™ looks beautiful on display in a nursery or child's bedroom, makes the perfect story time companion, puppet show star or gift for child or teacher. Machine wash instructions are sewn into the label.

description:
Caraway™ the adorable mouse Sockett® is made on a GENUINE, American cotton sock and detailed with soft, ecospun felt (made from 100% post-consumer recycled bottles.) Caraway™ has a soft felt mouth that allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak". Cute teeth, nylon whiskers and a long tail complete this magnificent mouse sock puppet. Available in gray, blue or purple or tan . Pair Caraway™ with Cashmere™ the cat for a classic cat & mouse set.

name: Cashmere™ Couture Cat Sock Puppet
description:
Cashmere™ is a fancy kitty cat Sockett® and the purrrfect story time companion. Handmade with love on a genuine, super soft, American cotton sock and detailed with colorful ecospun felt (made in New Hampshire from 100% recycled bottles) she has a long, braided, yarn tail and a soft felt mouth that complete with a quilted tongue, allows for a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak"(& purr). Cashmere™ is available in two sizes and seven, fabulous colors. Pair this kitty with Caraway™, Jack™ or Sidney™ for a splendid Sockett® set!

description:
Jack™ the lovable, spotted Dog Sockett® is a spunky energetic pup who loves having adventures in the park with his best friend. Sewn with Tigercandy Arts rare quality craftsmanship, this folksy dog sock puppet is made from ecospun felt on our thick, soft, genuine, American cotton sock base(knit exclusively for Socketts®!). A soft felt mouth complete with quilted tongue, gives this dog sock puppet a range of facial expressions and the ability to "speak" (Ruff!). Available in blue or chocolate brown.

name: Galaxy™  Couture Unicorn Sock Puppet
description:
Galaxy™ is a gorgeous, magical Unicorn Sockett® with a grace and dignity befitting an ancient, mythical creature. This unique unicorn sock puppet is sewn on our classic American cotton sock base. Her soft felt ears and horn are made from ecospun felt. She has kind eyes with soft brush lashes and an elegant, faux fur mane and matching yarn tail. As on all Sockett®, a soft felt mouth allows for a range of facial expressions and gives her the ability to "speak". Available in two sizes and three beautiful colors. Pair with a Dragon Sockett® for a medieval themed puppet show!

description:
Calliope ™ our female Dragon Sockett® is wide eyed and flashy and a terrifically fun companion! This dragon sock puppet is completely handmade on a genuine American cotton sock. Professional stitching and glorious, bright colors detail her 100% ecospun felt wings. Her fire is removable so she can blow kisses or flames depending upon your mood! Let your imagination soar with this inspired representation of the most beloved mythical creature of all time. Dragon sock puppets are available in multiple color options. See male version, Klaus™

description:
Klaus™ is a strong, fire breathing Dragon Sock Puppet. Sometimes he pals around with his friends and other times he takes off in solitary sock puppet flight, his vibrant wings taking in the warm sunshine. Klaus™ is made on a classic American cotton Sockett® base. He is detailed with ultra bright, colorful ecospun felt (made in New Hampshire from 100% post consumer recycled bottles). This amazing dragon puppet has a removable fire so he can talk or terrorize depending upon your mood! Available in two gorgeous colors! See female version, Calliope™

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Purim edition
description: Educators, call us to place your bulk orders Celebrate Purim with Stick Puppet Party!® Purim edition. This fabulous Purim puppet project is fun, fast-drying & easy to use. It features authentic, ancient Persian character design and makes 5, LARGE stick puppets: Esther, Vashti, Mordechai, Haman, & King Asheverosh. You assemble the puppets, color the included faces, design the clothing and perform the story of Purim with puppets you have made! Makes a wonderful gift, theme party activity, creative rainy day, religious school, family night, or after school project. Just add scissors and markers or crayons, everything else is included. Finished puppets stand over 14" tall and have movable arms & legs. Kit Contains: 5 corrugated cardboard bodies, 5 pairs of arms and legs, 5 blank heads, 5 printed faces, 5 sticks, 20 clips, 5 sheets of decorative paper for clothing, glue & directions. You make each character unique! Age 6-adult. Educators contact us for bulk order discount Copyright 2008 Tigercandy Arts, Inc. Package design by Rebecca A. Kandel. Purim puppet kit

name: Tigercandy Arts Gift Certificate
description: Can't decide which Sockett® or puppet kit they would love most? Buy them a Tigercandy Arts gift certificate instead! Click the "Buy Gift Certificate" Button above to choose a dollar amount and send a special message to your recipient!

name: Stick Puppet Party! Dia de Los Muertos
description: Make 5 LARGE stick puppets with Stick Puppet Party!® Dia de Los Muertos edition. This fabulous stick puppet kit uses fun and creativity to teach about the Mexican holiday Dia de Los Muertos. This is also a great stick puppet project for Halloween. Stick puppet kit includes: 5 blank corrugated bodies, 5 blank heads, 10 oak tag arms and leg, 5 skeleton faces, 5 sticks, 20 fasteners, 5 sheets of decorative paper, glue & easy to follow directions. Completed stick puppets stand 14" tall and have movable arms and legs. Age 5/6-adult. Package design by Rebecca Kandel-Scott copyright 2008 Click Here for a special Dia de Los Muertos animated treat!.

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Classic 5 pack
description: Design 5, One-of-a-kind, LARGE, stick puppets with movable arms and legs. Stick Puppet Party!® is a fun, fast-drying & easy-to-use puppet kit. It makes a wonderful party activity or creative school, rainy day or camp project. Kit Contains: 5 corrugated cardboard bodies, 5 pairs of arms and legs, 5 blank heads, 5 sticks, 20 clips, 50 ml non-toxic glue, and 5 sheets of 8.5x11 decorative paper for easy to make clothing. You make each character unique with magazine collage, enlarged photos or by drawing your own faces. Finished Puppets stand over 1 foot tall. Age 6-adult. Also available in Classic 10 Pack

description:

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Black History edition

name: Stick Puppet Party!® Chinese New Year ed.
description:
<font size =4>2012 Year of the Dragon!</font>

<font size =3>Create 5, LARGE, one-of-a-kind stick puppets with Stick Puppet Party!&#0174 Chinese New Year edition. KIT INCLUDES: 5 blank corrugated bodies, 10 blank arms and legs, 5 blank heads, 5 themed faces, 5 sticks, 20 fasteners, 5 sheets of decorative paper, 50ml glue, an informative synopsis of Chinese New Year & easy to follow directions. Assemble the puppets, design the clothing and color the included faces or make your own.  No two are alike! Finished puppets stand 14" tall and have movable arms and legs. Age 6-adult. Updated annually. </font>

name: Couture Faux Fur Teddy Bear Hat by Tigercandy Arts
description: This gorgeous, honey brown Bear hat is an original design by Tigercandy Arts. It is made from soft, lush, luxurious, faux fur. It is super warm & cuddly and machine washable. Available in every size, This amazing faux fur bear hat is the perfect accessory to the stylish child's or adult's wardrobe and can do double duty as a fun dress-up item too! Handmade-to-order in the USA! Polar Bear style: White faux fur with black inner ear. To Measure Hat Size: Measure the circumference of the widest part of the head (just above the eyebrows) using a flexible tape measure or a piece of string and a ruler. Sizes: Xsmall 20", Small 21", Medium 22", Large 23", Xlarge 24". Contact Us with questions or for custom sizes. Fur Teddy Bear Hat
